quote: Gardening is the handiest excuse for being a philosopher.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: Gardens are not made by singing 'Oh, how beautiful!' and sitting in the shade.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: A garden is a grand teacher. It teaches patience and careful watchfulness; it teaches industry and thrift; above all, it teaches entire trust.
author: Gertrude Jekyll

quote: The love of gardening is a seed once sown that never dies.
author: Gertrude Jekyll

quote: To plant a garden is to believe in tomorrow.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: The best time to plant a tree was twenty years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Flowers always make people better, happier, and more helpful; they are sunshine, food and medicine for the soul.
author: Luther Burbank

quote: He who plants a garden plants happiness.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: A garden is a delight to the eye and a solace for the soul.
author: Sadi

quote: The kiss of the sun for pardon, the song of the birds for mirth, one is nearer God's heart in a garden than anywhere else on earth.
author: Dorothy Frances Gurney

quote: In every gardener there is a child who believes in The Seed Fairy.
author: Robert Brault

quote: Gardening is a medicine that does not need a prescription... And with no limit on dosage.
author: Unknown

quote: Gardening is the art that uses flowers and plants as paint, and the soil and sky as canvas.
author: Elizabeth Murray

quote: In the garden of life, plant kindness and compassion.
author: Unknown

quote: The glory of gardening: hands in the dirt, head in the sun, heart with nature. To nurture a garden is to feed not just the body, but the soul.
author: Alfred Austin
